name: Invite Members/Guests - Warning when navigating away

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: MISSING - TM4J-Key-Missing-In-Cypress - TM4J key NOT found in any Cypress run reports  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. In the "Invite People" field enter an email of a user that's a Guest on a different team
  2. Select a user and/or channels
  3. Click the back arrow or "X" button
  4. Click "Cancel" in the "Discard Changes" warning that shows up
inline.expectedResult: Modal is dismissed and user remains on the Invite screen

inline.description: 1. Click the back arrow/X again and click "Yes, Discard"
inline.expectedResult: User is taken to the previous screen(if back arrow clicked) or back to the channel view
